trans-unit.source: Specifies the names of the entity properties to return when the query is executed against the table.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the names of the entity properties to return when the query is executed against the table.

trans-unit.source: The entity type of the query.
trans-unit.target: The entity type of the query.

trans-unit.source: The entity instance to project off of.
trans-unit.target: The entity instance to project off of.

trans-unit.source: A list of string objects containing the names of the entity properties to return when the query is executed.
trans-unit.target: A list of string objects containing the names of the entity properties to return when the query is executed.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuery</codeEntityReference> instance set with the entity properties to return.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuery</codeEntityReference> instance set with the entity properties to return.

trans-unit.source: The Project clause is optional on a query, used to limit the properties returned from the server.
trans-unit.target: The Project clause is optional on a query, used to limit the properties returned from the server.

trans-unit.source: By default, a query will return all properties from the entity.
trans-unit.target: By default, a query will return all properties from the entity.
